# u-registration-email-verification

## Properties

| Property             | Attribute          | Description                                                                        | Type      | Default     |
| -------------------- | ------------------ | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------- | ----------- |
| `autoSend`           | `auto-send`        | Whether to automatically send the verification code when this step becomes active. | `boolean` | `true`      |
| `componentClassName` | `class-name`       | CSS classes to apply to the fieldset container.                                    | `string`  | `undefined` |
| `inputClassName`     | `input-class-name` | CSS classes to apply to each individual digit input.                               | `string`  | `undefined` |
